name: Mr Antibody (Ludum Dare 38)
description:
As Mr Antibody, it's your job to rid this human's major organs of a nasty bacterial infection.

Instructions:

  • Hover the mouse pointer in the direction you wish to move.
  • Hovering your pointer further away will make you move faster.
  • Hold left mouse button to fire antibacterial goodness.
  • Don't stay in contact with bacteria, or you'll loose energy!

This game was made in under 2 days for Ludum Dare 38.
